original_text: And he shall examine the disease. And if the disease is in the walls of the house with greenish or reddish spots, and if it appears to be deeper than the surface,
korean_text: 그 색점을 볼 때에 그 집 벽에 푸르거나 붉은 무늬의 색점이 있어 벽보다 우묵하면

sentences.original_text: And he shall examine the disease.
And if the disease is in the walls of the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그 병이 집 벽에 있고,

sentences.original_text: and if it appears to be deeper than the surface,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 표면보다 더 깊어 보이면,
